results.title: Help yourself - self employment (Captioned)
results.brief_description: Self-employed people describe their work and explain why they are self employed. Their occupations vary from handyman, stallholders, to a proprietor of a chain of jeans stores. All of these businesses started with relatively small amounts of capital. The video also outlines essential steps to be taken by people considering self-employment and lists contacts who can give useful advice.
results.description: Self-employed people describe their work and explain why they are self employed. Their occupations vary from handyman, stallholders, to a proprietor of a chain of jeans stores. results.title: Help wanted: secretary
results.brief_description: A good secretary requires a state of mind that goes beyond the basic secretarial skills. Three situations in which bad secretarial practices are demonstrated are seen and are followed by a short restatement of the desired qualities of a good secretary.
results.description: A good secretary requires a state of mind that goes beyond the basic secretarial skills. Three situations in which bad secretarial practices are demonstrated are seen and are followed by a short restatement of the desired qualities of a good secretary.

results.title: Help me find myself
results.brief_description: Gerard Kennedy explains cerebral palsy, of which spasticity is one form. The film shows children and adults utilising their abilities to lead as normal a life as possible.

results.title: Help me die
results.creator_credit: Lori Hope, KGW-TV Portland and Brenda Buratti
results.brief_description: This program explores the controversial issue of euthanasia and probes the ethical issues involved when terminally ill loved ones ask a physician or family member for assistance in ending their life. It profiles individuals who want to end their pain through suicide, as well as others who seek pain relief through medication - or through programs which will allow them to die with dignity. This documentary invites us all to examine more closely conceptions of personal rights and responsibilities.

results.title: Help is
results.brief_description: First aid at the roadside - a clear demonstration of what the first person, or persons, on the scene of a motor vehicle accident should do during those critical minutes before ambulance and police arrive. A comprehensive film, dealing not only with on-the-spot treatment of injuries, but with the individual responsibility of every motorist in today’s total traffic picture. It was produced with the counsel of federal and provincial medical and traffic authorities.

results.title: Hello, Dolly!
results.creator_credit: Ernest Lehman, Chenault, Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation and Gene Kelly
results.brief_description: Barbra Streisand is a knockout as Dolly Levi, the woman “who arranges things… like furniture and daffodils and lives”. The plot concerns Dolly, a young widow and professional matchmaker, who sets her sights and whatever else she can muster, on conquering tight-fisted Yonkers merchant, Horace Vandergelder, beautifully played by Walter Matthau. Spend a magical evening with the incomparabale Barbra and enjoy a great musical. Co-starring Michael Crawford.

results.title: Hello Universe
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Horizon”.
Most scientists are convinced that extra-terrestrial life does exist, estimating that the galaxy is swarming with life. But the hard evidence is disappointingly scarce and as the search program gathers pace a different viewpoint is emerging - that after all the human race is alone in the universe. This program explores the probabilities of galactic neighbours.
